entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
